name: Vacubot
description:
vacubot

automated vacuum cleaner simulator. clean rooms as fast as possible.

go back to your base to empty your bag (check right progress bar).

when you got more than 96%, go back to your base to finish the room.

game done in (a little over) three hours for the Trijam #208 (theme: fill the vacuum).

controls

left/right (a/d): rotate the vacuum cleaner

up/down (w/s): move forward/backward
